html: People & small businesses in #NY19 still lack access to standalone broadband internet because of: -high service costs -lack of broadband infrastructure -& outdated, unreasonable bundling practices. In today’s global economy, broadband shouldn’t come with any strings attached.
text:
People & small businesses in #NY19 still lack access to standalone broadband internet because of: 
-high service costs
-lack of broadband infrastructure
-& outdated, unreasonable bundling practices. 
In today’s global economy, broadband shouldn’t come with any strings attached.

html: The amendment addresses a practice by some internet service providers which require broadband internet packages to be bundled with additional cable or telephone services that consumers may not need. You shouldn't be forced to buy unnecessary services just to access the internet.
text: The amendment addresses a practice by some internet service providers which require broadband internet packages to be bundled with additional cable or telephone services that consumers may not need. You shouldn't be forced to buy unnecessary services just to access the internet.

html: Additionally, it would include recommendations to Congress on ways to increase the availability of standalone broadband internet service, particularly in rural areas.
text: Additionally, it would include recommendations to Congress on ways to increase the availability of standalone broadband internet service, particularly in rural areas.

html: My amendment would give the Government Accountability Office 1 year to report to Congress on the benefits to consumers of making broadband internet service available to everyone on a standalone basis.
text: My amendment would give the Government Accountability Office 1 year to report to Congress on the benefits to consumers of making broadband internet service available to everyone on a standalone basis.

html: While the Trump Administration has too often wavered in its support for NATO & cozied up to our adversaries, I hope that today’s address reinforces the critical role NATO plays in protecting Americans at home & abroad. Security at home depends on our relationship with our allies.

html: As we address emerging threats, US must continue its strong NATO leadership. We're at a time where we face new landscape of evolving threats, from political interference & nuclear escalation from Russia to terrorism threat ISIS & other groups still pose in Middle East & beyond.

html: Low-income women and women of color are disproportionately blocked from accessing their full reproductive health options because of the Hyde Amendment, and I’m glad to join with my colleagues in fighting for its repeal.
text: Low-income women and women of color are disproportionately blocked from accessing their full reproductive health options because of the Hyde Amendment, and I’m glad to join with my colleagues in fighting for its repeal.

html: Women have a Constitutional right in our country to make their own decisions about their health care, including abortion. But the Hyde Amendment effectively denies that right, so that only women who can afford to access their right to an abortion can do so.
text: Women have a Constitutional right in our country to make their own decisions about their health care, including abortion. But the Hyde Amendment effectively denies that right, so that only women who can afford to access their right to an abortion can do so.

html: Proud to help introduce the EACH Woman Act, which repeals the Hyde Amendment and ensures that all women – regardless of their income level – can make their own choices about their reproductive health care. #4EACHofUs #BeBoldEndHydehttps://delgado.house.gov/media/press-releases/rep-antonio-delgado-helps-introduce-legislation-repeal-hyde-amendment-ensure …

html: Before she was killed, Chief Kent was working to change this flawed system, not just for herself, but for all members of the Armed Services. And now I'm working to understand what happened in Chief Kent's case, and what can be done to make sure it doesn't happen again.
text: Before she was killed, Chief Kent was working to change this flawed system, not just for herself, but for all members of the Armed Services. And now I'm working to understand what happened in Chief Kent's case, and what can be done to make sure it doesn't happen again.

html: Before she went on her final deployment to Syria, she wanted to enlist in a Ph.D. program -- but because she was a survivor of thyroid cancer, she was disqualified. Clearly something went wrong: How could she be fit to deploy in a combat zone but not to enter a Ph.D. program?
text: Before she went on her final deployment to Syria, she wanted to enlist in a Ph.D. program -- but because she was a survivor of thyroid cancer, she was disqualified. Clearly something went wrong: How could she be fit to deploy in a combat zone but not to enter a Ph.D. program?

text: Unsurprisingly, the terms of the agreement are far from perfect, but the bipartisan legislation does avert another harmful shutdown and allows us to get back to the important work we were sent here to do.

html: I’m pleased that Republicans and Democrats in the House and Senate came to an agreement to fund the government. However, that such an agreement could only be reached with the threat of yet another government shutdown is an indictment of our failing political system.

html: In light of emerging evidence on danger PFOA causes, it would be unconscionable for EPA to not limit levels of these chemicals in our communities. EPA must take water contamination seriously & I will do everything in my power to step up efforts to address this growing crisis.

html: We owe it to the federal employees, members of the Coast Guard, farmers, and others in our community who were impacted by this shutdown to make sure that we do not find ourselves here again.

html: From Day One, I’ve called for reopening the government and continuing negotiations. It’s what I reiterated in my recent letter with House Democrats, and I’m encouraged that Congress and the Administration are in agreement that we must reopen the government.
text: From Day One, I’ve called for reopening the government and continuing negotiations. It’s what I reiterated in my recent letter with House Democrats, and I’m encouraged that Congress and the Administration are in agreement that we must reopen the government.

html: Today’s deal finally brings relief to the people of Upstate New York and our entire country who have been impacted by this irresponsible and reckless shutdown. I’m pleased that this agreement will come to the floor and I look forward to supporting it.

html: From what I’ve witnessed firsthand in Hoosick Falls & Petersburgh, from hearing directly from families impacted by PFAS/PFOA contamination, it’s clear this is an alarming situation. We must shed light on this issue in Upstate NY & across the country, & put more urgency behind it.
text: From what I’ve witnessed firsthand in Hoosick Falls & Petersburgh, from hearing directly from families impacted by PFAS/PFOA contamination, it’s clear this is an alarming situation. We must shed light on this issue in Upstate NY & across the country, & put more urgency behind it.

html: I wrote to the Secretary of the Department of Agriculture to immediately extend expired EBT licenses—which are used to process SNAP benefits—for the duration of the shutdown so that no American will go hungry.https://delgado.house.gov/media/press-releases/rep-delgado-calls-answers-stalled-snap-license-renewals-during-government …

text:
A lawsuit jeopardizing the protections set forth in the ACA could not be any further from what we ought to be doing when it comes to solving the health care crisis.

html: We need to do much more to expand affordable and accessible health care to everyone, and no longer remain the lone developed country in the world without universal coverage.

html: While I'm glad that the Department of Agriculture will at least continue benefits through next month, the agency must lay out plans for how it's processing applications, communicating with families in the program & addressing lapse of funding if the government shutdown continues.

html: The irresponsible government shutdown is now putting at risk families' ability to put food on the table. From kids to seniors across the district, the SNAP program provides essential benefits.

html: Today I cosponsored #HR1, a historic government reform bill. Corporate power is commanding way too much attention in Washington; it is time that our government be responsive to the will of the people rather than the interests of a wealthy few and big corporations.
text: Today I cosponsored #HR1, a historic government reform bill. Corporate power is commanding way too much attention in Washington; it is time that our government be responsive to the will of the people rather than the interests of a wealthy few and big corporations.
